title: Reheated Cabbage
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: — Not at all, my dear, not at all, Ormiston smiled. He watched her depart, and his face sank into a frown as he contemplated the mind-numbing tedium of a family Sunday afternoon at Ravelston Dykes. — Bugger it, he hissed softly, then went to the toilet to clean himself up.

title: Filth
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Ray tells them that we're proceeding west in the direction of Craigleith. Control then inform us that some auld crone up in Ravelston Dykes has reported a burglary.

title: Filth
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: It was here! she's asserting. Ravelston Dykes. Money talks.

title: Filth
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: – Proceeding to address in Ravelston Dykes. D.S. Robertson and Lennox, over.
